summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FINDELMUNNDO artist portfolio site. Fixed critical auth issues in backend, verified all API endpoints, and tested complete frontend user flows including intro screen, navigation, contact form, admin system, and portfolio functionality.

resolved_issues.issue: JWT authentication middleware not properly configured
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Fixed FastAPI Header dependency injection for Authorization header

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile navigation may not be fully responsive

design_issues.issue: Minor accessibility warning for Dialog component
design_issues.details: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent in media upload modal

passed_tests: Admin registration and login with JWT
All media API endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Home page intro screen and transition
About page with bio and services
Contact form submission with success toast
action_item_for_main_agent: Improve mobile navigation responsiveness and add proper aria-describedby attribute to admin upload dialog for better accessibility. Consider adding loading states for better UX during API calls.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor responsive navigation issue on mobile
